title: Scenario-based Instructional Design for Text Summarization Support in Distance Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device proficiency and mathematical concepts comprehension
context.additional_context: Learners acquire online text summarization skills using digital devices in a blended environment, with the goal of improving math problem-solving abilities

learning_goals: Learners can apply techniques to summarize complex mathematical texts within three sentences.
Learners can develop mathematical problem-solving strategies using summarized texts through scenario-based tasks.
Learners can achieve over 80% accuracy in text summarization with peer feedback and support from automated tools.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
